overview: Dr. Malvedades intends to bring back Joc치ntaro, a Beast of the Apocalypse. To do this, he uses underwater ninja zombies to kidnap five women who had recently lost their virginity for human sacrifices. Jess, a Catholic surfer who has commited to remain chaste until he's 24, tries to rescue his girlfriend, one of the kidnapped girls, along with his friends.
tagline: Karate Zombies! Catholic surfers! Teenage Virgins! A filthy beast is about to wake up!
title: Death Karate in Torremolinos
